actions.name: Coral Spear
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 4 (1d6+1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sharpened Shell
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 3 (1d4+1) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Nimble Rush
bonus_actions.desc: The merfolk takes the Dash or Disengage action.

reactions.name: Coral Scrape
reactions.desc: When a creature the merfolk can see hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it, the merfolk can twist its body to scrape the attacker's arm or similar attacking appendage across the rough coral of its armor. The attacker must succeed on a DC 11 DEX save or have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn, as its attacking appendage hurts from the abrasion.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The merfolk can breathe air and water.
